AboutMe:
I am a passionate programmer. I love developing algorithms, give me an "impossible" problem and I will give you a solution. =)

Currently I am developer at Flextronics in Mexico on with the Flexsense Monitoring team. (monitoring everything that has an IP address from room tematures to routers to virtual servers)

I am fluent in Spanish and I worked/am working 2+ years in Guadalajara Mexico.

I am currently developing a WordLexicon.com in my free time. The end goal is to have complete dictionarys in almost any language and have all the words translated to all the other languages. I'm Starting with Spanish/English.

My personality type is INTJ. You can read all about me here: http://www.personalitypage.com/html/INTJ.html =)
